name: A pair of silver-lined black boots
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than avarage.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
The spectral residue lingering around these boots can help keep the cold grasp of death at bay.
